name: Zuzalu Townhall
description:
This interactive gathering that is HIGHLY encouraged for all current residents to attend. This is your chance to help shape the future of our community! Come collaborate with other Zuzalians, and make a meaningful impact on our collective vision for Zuzalu now and in the future.


Our pop-up city is unlike any other and evolving rapidly. Your insights and creativity are invaluable in driving the growth of our community, and this meeting is the perfect opportunity to channel that energy into transformative ideas and projects. It also gives you a sense of all that is going on week by week in our community and how you can get the most out of your contribution during your time here.

As residents of the Zuzalu community, your participation is crucial for our continued success. We encourage you to bring your most ambitious ideas and an open mind, ready to constructively criticize, contribute and find solutions to support the growth and future of Zuzalu.
